channel.title: [508]could some one help me please really need it :s
channel.description:
hello everyone,
i was trying to add dragon claws to my 508server (bulby source) i used this tutorial: [url=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/170278-508-adding-d-claws.html]http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/170278-508-adding-d-claws.html[/url] change google to www.rune/server/.org/ without "/" think they change it for spam or something everything is good i thought so i compiled it no problems in compiling. but when i ty to start my server i get this: [b]Starting server on port: 43594[/b] <-- no problem but then...
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at Bulby.world.items.Items.loadItemList(Items.java:369) at Bulby.world.items.Items.<init>(Items.java:31) at Bulby.Engine.<init>(Engine.java:144) at Bulby.Server.main(Server.java:53) Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .(press any key to continu)
help me please what did i wrong :(

item.title: [508]could some one help me please really need it :s
item.dc:creator: @matthy matthy
item.description:
@matthy wrote:

ow ok its working thx bro really ty

so i need to re-port forward?restarted pc already
i just re-port forwarded an restarted my pc keep getting problem
someone can help me?

hmm i looked a bit on internet and i found 1page with some one who got the same error and he changed the items.cfg like me and he forgot a tab but where i need to put tabs in that line i edited?0.o
